mapper.select: select tGoalNum, tGoalTitle, to_char(tStartDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "tStartDate", to_char(tEndDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "tEndDate", tClear, tStartStatus, openStatus, userid, progressNum from TOPGOAL where tGoalNum = #{tGoalNum}

select m.mGoalNum, t.tGoalTitle, m.mGoalTitle, m.mClear, m.tGoalNum, to_char(mStartDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "mStartDate", to_char(mEndDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "mEndDate" from midGoal m, topGoal t where m.tGoalNum = t.tGoalNum and m.tGoalNum = #{tGoalNum}
select * from memberList where progressNum = (select progressNum from topGoal where tGoalNum = #{tGoalNum})
